constraints.name: set_symmetric_difference_sum_leq_m
constraints.description: 排列后的集合对称差分和不超过给定常数 M

constraints.name: distinct_points
constraints.formal: (x_i, y_i) \neq (x_j, y_j) \text{ for all } i \neq j

constraints.name: non_empty_sets
constraints.formal: A_j x_i + B_j y_i + C_j > 0 \text{ for at least one } (x_i, y_i)
